document_data.mainbody: '''Renewal domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers related to renewal.
document_data.Powers: The first time in a day that a spellcaster with this domain was knocked unconscious and dying through injury, he or she partially regenerated health, possibly enough to regain consciousness.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[charm person]]'', ''[[lesser restoration]]'', and ''[[remove disease]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[reincarnate]]'', ''[[atonement]]'', and ''[[heroes' feast]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[greater restoration]]'', ''[[polymorph any object]]'', and ''[[freedom]]''.
